title: China Evergrande Says State-Backed Risk Team Will Engage With Creditors
sub_head: Developer has roughly $300 billion in liabilities
body:
Debt-laden China Evergrande Group said the committee helping steer its massive restructuring is deploying extensive resources to help contain risks and will engage with creditors.
The reassurance echoes a pledge earlier this month to work with holders of offshore debt and follows a sustained selloff in the companyâ€™s stock and bonds, with Evergrande shares recently hitting a series of record lows.
